thread.title: George Clooney accuses Donald Trump of being part of the Hollywood elite he so criticises
thread.title_full: George Clooney accuses Donald Trump of being part of the Hollywood elite he so criticises

author: Naomi Gordon
title: George Clooney accuses Donald Trump of being part of the Hollywood elite he so criticises
text:
George Clooney has accused Donald Trump of belonging to the Hollywood elite that he continues to lambaste, adding that he is the recipient of a substantial amount of money from his Screen Actors Guild pension scheme. The actor told Canal+ : "He [Trump] collects $120,000 a year in his Screen Actors Guild pension fund. He is a Hollywood elitist."
The US President released a disclosure in 2015 that stated he had claimed $110,228 from the body of which he is a member, although it's not certain whether it was an annual fee.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Trump has also had cameos in Home Alone 2 and The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air , while The Apprentice and The Celebrity Apprentice – which he hosted prior to his presidency – has earned him $213.6 million over 11 years, according to his financial disclosure .
Clooney continued: "Steve Bannon [Trump's chief strategist] is a failed film writer and director.
"That's the truth, that's what he's done. He wrote a Shakespearean rap musical about the LA riots that he couldn't get made. He made a lot of money off of Seinfeld . He's elitist Hollywood, I mean, that's the reality."
